entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening then changing to rain before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
